Code Exercise
Using C# write a function that adds a line of a variable number of commas to the beginning of the text file included. The existing text file should not be readable by any other process while it is being read.

Note there are a two free tools you can use to accomplish this if needed:
Visual Studio Code - https://code.visualstudio.com/
Visual Studio Community Edition - https://visualstudio.microsoft.com/vs/community/

For example, given a sample file below:

00000,7C2DB09D310ECE0B36D50C86E4C3E6641684948CD6FC03262B0D0ED91A6CFBC3CD5AFFD396C1F85FD0A109B103364B19,,,
00001,68972FB5A365FC78733F3EEC28F77AE1E9A6A841C64638CED05C8F088CAE72A041F1DC46EB4AB2429FC293BC34EF28FD,,,
00002,FD0C1CCDE1F403DB83A48449D8152921CBD6FD3F376BE51D8409F825C61729FF6D5003C80D72805640A097608C1B8ED2,,,
00003,F2E1A490ACBA1DA06FB770B3A83D14926EC11FC3C9700D72A480C1C8A9D6D75839F6AC727B8FC597D640DE78B9B14736,,,
00004,CF0D81C752A6A7460FA79F9CB8C4C48C08799433381642865E3B84CEDCC79CDFE189D0C2B95C299A2F6A9D1EC03D84EB,,,
00005,A2FF014E3A2C30B9E808901331D1379BF53D5222F83E5F85A77A8BC7388F05F6609E122E070633DD81982F219BDFAA26,,,
00006,C0726DC25179B9F1635976F56C816C5226DDC21B843B70976DE5940F4CA9E8C5856DA848C63AB28954308D90792E2CEE,,,
00007,303FB25B783BB9F2E9DED9407DE0B96710E4F7F2D252E6C0538BE2CF2A9AD7FF427EEB99DFBDE43B3969850E915E7577,,,
00008,5BABFD57A4F1CC322EA6003AAC5F1377DCBA69781D4E98A338194120E74A9B064DC2E4847FDE131DB2A2CC8815F4E213,,,
00009,2CD5F963FCC5349252BB0E46B72F2C39F60902803DDDB61CDD97F2BF57123F1ADDB6F9AE4DE63267993C207569525440,,,

If the variable number of "5" commas are added the output would look like this:

,,,,,
00000,7C2DB09D310ECE0B36D50C86E4C3E6641684948CD6FC03262B0D0ED91A6CFBC3CD5AFFD396C1F85FD0A109B103364B19,,,
00001,68972FB5A365FC78733F3EEC28F77AE1E9A6A841C64638CED05C8F088CAE72A041F1DC46EB4AB2429FC293BC34EF28FD,,,
00002,FD0C1CCDE1F403DB83A48449D8152921CBD6FD3F376BE51D8409F825C61729FF6D5003C80D72805640A097608C1B8ED2,,,
00003,F2E1A490ACBA1DA06FB770B3A83D14926EC11FC3C9700D72A480C1C8A9D6D75839F6AC727B8FC597D640DE78B9B14736,,,
00004,CF0D81C752A6A7460FA79F9CB8C4C48C08799433381642865E3B84CEDCC79CDFE189D0C2B95C299A2F6A9D1EC03D84EB,,,
00005,A2FF014E3A2C30B9E808901331D1379BF53D5222F83E5F85A77A8BC7388F05F6609E122E070633DD81982F219BDFAA26,,,
00006,C0726DC25179B9F1635976F56C816C5226DDC21B843B70976DE5940F4CA9E8C5856DA848C63AB28954308D90792E2CEE,,,
00007,303FB25B783BB9F2E9DED9407DE0B96710E4F7F2D252E6C0538BE2CF2A9AD7FF427EEB99DFBDE43B3969850E915E7577,,,
00008,5BABFD57A4F1CC322EA6003AAC5F1377DCBA69781D4E98A338194120E74A9B064DC2E4847FDE131DB2A2CC8815F4E213,,,
00009,2CD5F963FCC5349252BB0E46B72F2C39F60902803DDDB61CDD97F2BF57123F1ADDB6F9AE4DE63267993C207569525440,,,

When the exercise is complete please include all of the files required to run the exercise to casey.mcfarlane@delaget.com and we'll setup time with you to review.
